definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: It is thus necessary to develop ecotoxicological diagnosis methods.
sentences.chinese: 因此，需要發展污染生態毒理學診斷方法。

sentences.english: To provide toxicological basis for the safety evaluation of Yikeyuan beauty capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲依科源牌美容膠囊安全性評價提供毒理學依據。

sentences.english: Toxicology is currently a guessing game.
sentences.chinese: 現在的毒理學研究就像猜謎遊戲。

sentences.english: This paper was to investigate the mutagenicity of KINGPANAX fresh Panax notoginseng juice.
sentences.chinese: 研究了金不換鮮三七液特殊毒理學效應的致突變性。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze toxicological and biological characteristics of transfluthrin.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析四氟苯菊酯的毒理學和生物學特徵。

sentences.english: Toxicology certifies that it has no obvious toxic action.
sentences.chinese: 毒理學表明寧動顆粒無明顯毒副反應。

sentences.english: Objective To study the toxicity of calcium hyaluronate.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究透明質酸鈣的毒理學特性。

sentences.english: Contact the toxicologist in Los Angeles Californiawho specializes in nanotechnology.
sentences.chinese: 聯繫加州洛杉磯專門研究納米技術的毒理學家。

sentences.english: Toxicologists attempt to identify and understand toxic hazards.
sentences.chinese: 毒理學家試圖找出並瞭解毒害風險。

sentences.english: Further validation of this study is provided today by a new study from the National Toxicology Program.
sentences.chinese: 國家毒理學規劃處今日發出一份更深入的驗證研究。

sentences.english: Nanotoxicology is a new area of research.
sentences.chinese: 納米毒理學是一個新的研究領域。
